Summary: Ufo still at first over sky, then accelerated away and disappeared after shooting across 2/3 of sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to smoke a cigarette and was standing on my stoop when I noticed this star like object was moving very very slowly, as could be seen with other stars as reference points. It was a very clear night, and so I stared at it, knowing this could not be a plane or helicopter, but maybe a comet or maybe a satellite. I called my friend on the phone to talk to him about it but just as I was calling it started to speed up so I stared again and it seemed to accelerate at speeds nothing on earth could recreate, it was almost exponential, and then the light just went away (dissolved) over a period of .5-1 sec. Not instantly, just faded away. At first, I was amazed, but now I really want some kind of explanation.
